body_html:
These are the only contents of my libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/doc/
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/
-rw-r--r-- 0 root root 0 Aug 31 2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/copyright
-rw-r--r-- 0 root root 158 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/changelog.Debian.gz
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/lintian/
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/lintian/overrides/
-rw-r--r-- 0 root root 45 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/share/lintian/overrides/libcudnn7
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/lib/
drwxr-xr-x 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/
-rw-r--r-- 0 root root 217439272 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.7.0.3
lrwxrwxrwx 0 root root 0 Sep 16 2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.0.3

NOTE: I don't have dpkg installed on my system and I don't have permissions to install it either. So I downloaded libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el from nvidia repo on my macbook, extracted .deb file and converted it to tar.gz which I then sent to my install machine.

body:
These are the only contents of my libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/doc/
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/
-rw-r--r--  0 root   root        0 Aug 31  2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/copyright
-rw-r--r--  0 root   root      158 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/doc/libcudnn7/changelog.Debian.gz
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/lintian/
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/lintian/overrides/
-rw-r--r--  0 root   root       45 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/share/lintian/overrides/libcudnn7
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/lib/
drwxr-xr-x  0 root   root        0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/
-rw-r--r--  0 root   root 217439272 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.7.0.3
lrwxrwxrwx  0 root   root         0 Sep 16  2017 ./usr/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.0.3


**NOTE:** I don't have dpkg installed on my system and I don't have permissions to install it either. So I downloaded libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el from [nvidia repo](https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/machine-learning/repos/ubuntu1604/ppc64el/) on my macbook, extracted .deb file and converted it to tar.gz which I then sent to my install machine.
